::Battera:;

She smiled.  She knew now why Iron Raptor ws the leader.  "As =
far as 
where it is, it is being held in Voluis's embassy.  I will give you=
 
the co-ordinants later on.  As fas as who will be there, the other 
maixi=
mal leader and the Predacon leaders.  All the group leaders are 
being invi=
ted to attend.  You may bring one or two bots that you 
trust with you if y=
ou wish.  We will be giving each leader thier own 
quarters and so on.  And=
 complete privacy before and after each talk 
session.  How long with will =
take, that I am not sure of.  Allt he 
groups have been warring for some ti=
me.  So it may take a while."   
She stopped and smiled at Iron Raptor.  "B=
ut wouldn't it be worth the 
time?  Please consider it.  I have tried hard =
to help these talks 
become successful.  Please, help us to bring peace to =
the groups.  It 
would mean an end to the war."

She was honest and sincere=
.  She ws truely worried that she wouldn't 
attend the talks.  She wanted, =
more than anything, to bring about the 
end of the war and have peace among=
 the groups.
